name: Visual Studio Code
title: code.visualstudio.com
shortDescription: Visual Studio Code is a powerful code editor redefined and optimized for building and debugging modern web and cloud applications. It supports development in multiple programming languages and integrates AI features to enhance coding efficiency. Ideal for developers, it offers features like agent mode, where the editor suggests edits and runs commands, enhancing productivity in real-time development scenarios.
pros: Integrates with AI for advanced code suggestions
Supports a wide range of programming languages
cons: High resource usage on older machines
Overwhelming number of extensions can confuse
